title: Red Sea crisis impacting supply chain, expect recovery in coming months: Audi India Head
description: Container vessels have been facing attacks in the Red Sea, one of the most important trade routes in the world, since November last year following Israel's war against Hamas. Deliveries to customers for certain models at present have been delayed by a few weeks, Audi India Head Balbir Singh Dhillon noted.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
